rooms.description: Serves as a welcoming entry with accessible features and storage for mobility aids.
Spacious living area facing north to ensure sunlight and positive Vastu alignment.
Functional kitchen with wheelchair-friendly layout including lower countertops and accessible appliances.

rooms.location: adjacent to living room and kitchen
rooms.description: Compact dining area integrated within the living space for convenience.
Master bedroom designed with wheelchair accessibility in mind, ensuring ample space for maneuverability.
Secondary bedroom with similar accessibility features.
Common bathroom designed for accessibility with safety features.
Compact storage area ensuring easy access to frequently used items.

openings.description: Main entrance with accessible ramp and automatic door system.
Windows oriented to the north to harness natural light in compliance with Vastu.
East facing windows to promote a lively atmosphere and natural light entry.

openings.location: between living room and dining area
openings.description: Doorway connecting the living room and dining area.

openings.location: between master bedroom and common bathroom
openings.description: Doorway ensuring easy access from the master bedroom to the bathroom.

openings.location: central courtyard wall in all rooms
openings.description: Integrated openings into the central courtyard for natural ventilation and light.

central_courtyard.description: Central courtyard designed to promote natural light and ventilation while serving as a communal space. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning with cardinal directions.

notes.vastu_considerations: The design ensures north-facing primary living spaces, an east-west central courtyard for balanced energy flow, and proper spatial layout to promote harmony.
notes.wheelchair_accessibility: All doorways and pathways are designed to be wheelchair accessible with ramps, wide thresholds, and ample maneuvering space.
